projectMeta.name: Context AI Platform
projectMeta.description: AI-powered software creation platform with beautiful landing page and Internet Identity authentication
projectMeta.userIntent: Build foundation for AI software creation platform called Context with landing page and authentication

coreRequirements.primaryGoal: Create a beautiful landing page with Internet Identity login for an AI software creation platform
essentialFeatures: Black, gray, green, orange, and brown color scheme
No ICP branding visible to end users
explicitRequirements: Beautiful landing page better than reference

keyInteractions: User clicks login to authenticate with Internet Identity
Authentication state managed via React context
Redirect to dashboard after successful login
